articles.title: Artificial intelligence can unlock historic data for today’s missions
articles.summary: Advanced chips that didn't exist two years ago can enable smart intelligence, bases, and planning.

articles.title: National school poll reveals American support for DEI, Dept. of Education - but not AI
articles.summary: Confidence in American public schools has dropped to an all-time low, according to a national survey that also showed support for diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives in the school system and resistance to artificial intelligence in the classroom.
articles.translated_title: National school poll reveals American support for DEI, Dept. of Education - but not AI

articles.title: Agentic AI has companies excited and security experts freaked out
articles.summary: Eight in 10 corporations now use artificial intelligence agents. But security researchers keep finding how easily they're manipulated.

articles.title: AI Makes It Harder for Entry-Level Coders to Find Jobs, Study Says
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is making it harder for entry-level workers in the US to find jobs in fields like software development and customer service, according to new research.
articles.translated_title: AI Makes It Harder for Entry-Level Coders to Find Jobs, Study Says

articles.title: Artificial intelligence's real impact on sports concessions
articles.summary: "Just because a workflow is being disrupted does not mean we should be locked into the status quo," writes one reader. Another: "Today’s thought leaders need to be cognizant that they are entering uncharted waters."

articles.title: US Attorneys General tell AI companies they 'will be held accountable' for child safety failures
articles.summary: The US Attorneys General of 44 jurisdictions have signed a letter, urging AI companies to protect children "from exploitation by predatory artificial intelligence products."

articles.title: Google AI system promotes outlandish fake overview of Jeff Bezos mom's funeral: report
articles.summary: Google's Artificial Intelligence overview system promoted outlandish rumors about the funeral of Jeff Bezos' mother before the small ceremony even occurred -- including that rapper Eminem performed and Elon Musk made an appearance, according to a report.
